name: Pink. Yellow. Blue. Red. Black.
description:
Pink, Yellow, Blue, Red, Black, is a rage induced platformer, featuring 50 levels. Each 10 levels introducing a new color, as well as new character physics, to up the difficulty and overall challenge.

Controls.

* Use the right, and left arrow keys to move your character.

*Use the spacebar to jump.

*Press ESC at any time to close the game. (If you exit the game, all progress will be lost)
